QuestData.Title: The Broken Front
QuestData.Description: What battle?! Those troops were on a recon mission!$b$bAnd what's this talk of Alliance - you're sure he said Alliance?$b$bListen to me, $n! I need to know what's going on and I need to know NOW!$b$bGet yourself down there and get me some answers! Scour the battlefield and look for survivors - clues - anything!
QuestData.LogDescription: Korm Blackscar on Orgrim's Hammer wants you to go to The Broken Front and question a Dying Berserker to discover what happened there.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, $n?$b$bHave you got new information for me?
QuestData.RewardText: They saw the Alliance assaulting the gate and they attacked them from behind...$b$b<After a brief pause, Korm bursts into laughter.>$b$bTHAT is what it means to be HORDE!$b$bWere it not for them, the Alliance maggots would likely be holding that gate!$b$bTheir boldness has bought us precious time.
